meanings.definition: Redirected or diverted into a different channel or pathway.
meanings.sent1: The water was rechanneled to flow towards the garden.
meanings.sent2: After the road construction, the traffic was rechanneled through a detour.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel rechanneled the birdseed into its own hiding spot.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was rechanneled into studying for the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent5: The energy from the storm was rechanneled to power the entire town.

meanings.definition: Transferred or moved to a new channel or direction.
meanings.sent1: The rechanneled river provided a new path for the kayakers.
meanings.sent2: The rechanneled funds helped support the local community center.
meanings.sent3: The rechanneled sunlight created a beautiful reflection on the lake.
meanings.sent4: Her rechanneled focus led to a successful outcome.
meanings.sent5: The rechanneled traffic avoided the usual congestion on the highway.
